alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 27 at 2:57AM AKST until February 28 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills south of Shaktoolik. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 6 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow reducing visibility to near zero at times. Gusty winds could blow items around. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall around Norton Bay.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
